SELECT HAIR_NUMBER, HAIR_NAME, HAIR_GENDER, SHAPE_NUMBER, HAIR_FILE_NAME, HAIR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, HAIR_FILE_UUID, SHAPE_NAME FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, H.HAIR_NUMBER, H.HAIR_NAME, H.HAIR_GENDER, H.SHAPE_NUMBER, HF.HAIR_FILE_NAME, HF.HAIR_FILE_UPLOAD_PATH, HF.HAIR_FILE_UUID, FS.SHAPE_NAME FROM ( SELECT HAIR_NUMBER, HAIR_NAME, HAIR_GENDER, SHAPE_NUMBER FROM TBL_HAIR WHERE SHAPE_NUMBER = #{shapeNumber} AND HAIR_GENDER = #{hairGender} ) H LEFT JOIN TBL_HAIR_FILE HF ON H.HAIR_NUMBER = HF.HAIR_NUMBER JOIN TBL_FACE_SHAPE FS ON H.SHAPE_NUMBER = FS.SHAPE_NUMBER )S1
WHERE ROWNUM <= 2
